video_prompt: Rain-streaked cyberpunk city. Neon-suited motorcyclists with glowing visors move en masse towards the viewer, their bikes leaving vibrant light trails on the wet, reflective asphalt. Distant traffic lights change, while illuminated billboards flash across towering, dark skyscrapers. Pedestrians huddle, reacting to the passing procession.
image_prompt: Vertical full shot: Cyberpunk city at night, heavy rain, procession of 8+ motorcyclists in sleek dark suits with glowing visors drive towards viewer. Motorcycles emit vibrant blue and purple neon light, creating streaks on wet, reflective asphalt. Rain streaks visible. Debris on ground. Brightly lit tall skyscrapers with numerous electronic billboards and neon signs (magenta, blue, purple). Pedestrians on sidewalks. Dynamic, visually striking, futuristic. Watermark "c29" bottom right.
refined_video_prompt: Neon-suited motorcyclists surge forward, their glowing visors shifting as they approach, bikes carving vibrant light trails on the reflecting ground. Rain visibly streaks down, distorting the reflections of changing traffic lights and flashing billboards across buildings. Pedestrians huddle closer, their expressions subtly reacting to the passing throng.
